thread.title: Carli Hemele
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Carli Hemele

author: Carli Hemele
title: Carli Hemele
text: I got my furniture the next day, they helped me arrange it to my liking and did an excellent job bringing it in. I absolutely love my sectional. I paid a great price for excellent quality. Other stores just didn't compare. Thank you.
